page.title: 04NEWCASTLE WESTERN BY-PASS.
page.content: The Western By-Pass will be built between Fawdon/Kenton and Kingston Park to take busy traffic away from Gosforth High Street. A{fly-over}will be built over the Metro track and there will be a new {roundabout}on the Kingston Park Road. Pedestrians will be able to cross by using{subways}which will be straight and well lit for safety.There is concern about the amount of{noise and {exhaust fumes}which will be created,so people living near the By-Pass have been offered free double or triple glazing were necessary.A lot of {people are moving}because of the By-Pass.Some have said that they have no objections in principle but{would {prefer the road to go under the Metro and a footbridge provided for people to cross the By-Pass.
